Package fr.uge.gitclout.api

Class Controllers

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.gitclout.api.Controllers
@Controller public class Controllers extends Object
Controller class for handling Git related requests.
Author:
Tagnan Tremellat

  • Method Details

    • processRepository

      @Post(uri="/postLink", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public io.micronaut.http.HttpResponse<RepositoryDTO> processRepository(@Body String requestBody) throws org.eclipse.jgit.api.errors.GitAPIException, IOException
      Verifies a git link and returns a response.
      Parameters:
      requestBody - The git link to be verified.
      Returns:
      HttpResponse with the processed repository.
      Throws:
      org.eclipse.jgit.api.errors.GitAPIException
      IOException

    • findAll

      @Get("/allRepository") public List<RepositoryDTO> findAll()
      Finds all repositories.
      Returns:
      List of all repositories.

    • getRepositoryById

      @Post(uri="/postId", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public Optional<RepositoryDTO> getRepositoryById(@Body long id)
      Retrieves a repository by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the repository.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the repository if found.

    • processContributor

      @Post(uri="/postContrib", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public List<ContributionDTO> processContributor(@Body Tag tag)
      Processes contributor data by tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - The tag to process contributions for.
      Returns:
      List of contribution data.

    • deleteRepository

      @Post(uri="/deleteRepo", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public io.micronaut.http.HttpResponse<String> deleteRepository(@Body String repository)
      Deletes a repository.
      Parameters:
      repository - The repository to delete.
